item.title: Microsoft’s New Systems Language
item.description: Number #3 on Praeclarum’s list hits home for me, but all his points are both valid and strong. As a programming language nerd I had mixed feelings when Jon Galloway tweeted about Microsoft’s new programming language. “Why are your feelings mixed?” I kept asking myself. I love new programming languages. I took an internship at Microsoft just so I could be closer to the people who made C#. I read language specs for fun.
